description:
Montreal, March 16th, 2015, by Timothy Suttons - Yes, we exist. And Python powers a lot of the popular open-source tools we use to manage Mac clients at a large scale. We'll tour a few of these FOSS projects and take a quick look at how the Python Objective-C bridge can be used to access OS X system APIs.

* Contact Tim: https://twitter.com/tvsutton
* MP52: http://sflx.ca/mp52
* Montreal Python: http://montrealpython.org
* Savoir-faire Linux: http://sflx.ca/jobs
title: Why Mac sysadmins love Python
